attributes.action: Re-open Harrow Police Station for Emergency Response
attributes.additional_details: As residents we pay for a police service that we are not receiving!
attributes.background: Harrow Police Station was closed for Emergency Response after an amalgamation with Brent.  This is too large an area and Harrow has seen a surge in violent crime, burglary, drug abuse issues and has potentially seen two murders since the beginning of the year. Residents need to feel supported.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for the Met Police. You can find out more here:

https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/home-affairs/communities/police-stations-are-they-a-thing-of-the-past/
